title: and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU) 2021/953 of the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (EU Digital
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (EU Digital 

Covid Certificates) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 14th day of April
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (eu digital covid certificates) (amendment) regulation 2022 (2) regulation shall come operation 14th day april

title: and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU) 2021/953 of the
and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU) 2021/953 of the
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the European Union (EU Digital Covid Certificates)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the European Union (EU Digital Covid Certificates) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 318 of 2021) is amended by the substitution of the 
following definition for the definition of “Digital Covid Certificate Regulation”: 

issuance, verification and acceptance of 

“ ‘Digital Covid Certificate Regulation’ means Regulation (EU) 2021/953 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 14 June 20211 on a framework for 
the 
interoperable COVID-19 
vaccination, test and recovery certificates (EU Digital COVID Certificate) to 
facilitate free movement during the COVID-19 pandemic, as amended by 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/2288 of 21 December 20212, 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/256 of 22 February 20223 and 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/503 of 29 March 20224;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 April, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

1 OJ No. L 211, 15.06.2021, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 458, 22.12.2021, p. 459 
3 OJ No. L 42, 23.02.2022, p. 4 
4 OJ No. L 102, 30.03.2022, p. 8 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [182] 3

title: and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU) 2021/953 of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations made under section 3 of the European Communities Act (No. 
27 of 1972) serve to amend S.I. No. 318 of 2021 with respect to the definition of 
‘Digital Covid Certificate Regulation’. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [182]
